body: Actually, might have been a casting issue? Not sure if kind is typed as enum or int. Maybe it would've worked if I tried something like case((int)aten::add)?
body_html: Actually, might have been a casting issue? Not sure if kind is typed as enum or int. Maybe it would've worked if I tried something like case((int)aten::add)?
body_text: Actually, might have been a casting issue? Not sure if kind is typed as enum or int. Maybe it would've worked if I tried something like case((int)aten::add)?
